text.section: This section applies to a water column lease in the waters of the State.

The Department may issue to a person a water column lease in waters of the State after the Department of the Environment classifies the waters as:
Approved, conditionally approved, or restricted for harvest; or
Prohibited, provided that the lease is used exclusively for the planting and gathering of seed for aquaculture and the leaseholder complies with the requirements of the National Shellfish Sanitation Program as implemented by the Department.

section.section: The provisions of paragraph (1)(v) of this subsection do not apply to the riparian owner or a lawful occupant of the riparian property.

text.section:
A person with a water column lease in the waters of the State may cultivate shellfish:
Subject to approval by the United States Army Corps of Engineers, on or under the surface of the water in a floating structure; or
In any other manner authorized by the Department.
